mapper.insert: insert into SMS_RECORD_B (ID, FROMMAN, SENDTIME, CONTENT, TOMANS, SUCCESS, FAILURE, SUBTIME, TOTELS, STATE, ISTIMED, DEFTIME, TYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tomans,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{success,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{failure,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{subtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totels,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{istimed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deftime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update SMS_RECORD_B set FROMMAN = #{fromman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SENDTIME = #{sendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOMANS = #{tomans,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUCCESS = #{success,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FAILURE = #{failure,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUBTIME = #{subtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTELS = #{totels,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ISTIMED = #{istimed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEFTIME = #{deftime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, FROMMAN, SENDTIME, CONTENT, TOMANS, SUCCESS, FAILURE, SUBTIME, TOTELS, STATE, ISTIMED, DEFTIME, TYPE from SMS_RECORD_B where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, FROMMAN, SENDTIME, CONTENT, TOMANS, SUCCESS, FAILURE, SUBTIME, TOTELS, STATE, ISTIMED, DEFTIME, TYPE from SMS_RECORD_B where 1=1 ${_parameter} order by SUBTIME desc
